subtitle: Detrended Price Oscillator — removes trend to highlight cycles.

measures.how_to_read: Oscillations around zero show short-term cycles independent of trend.
measures.caveats: Not a standalone signal; use with context.

assistant_hints: Use to isolate cycles; confirm with range/band context.
Zero crosses and peaks help time entries/exits.
Avoid as a sole trigger in strong trends.
Tune window length to instrument behavior.
